mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT val) from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and lxbs=#{zx}
SELECT DISTINCT lxbs from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT *, concat(#{zx}, '左幅') as name from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs = #{zx} ORDER BY zdbs,zh,FIELD(cd, ${result})
SELECT *,concat(#{zx}, '右幅') as name from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs = #{zx} ORDER BY zdbs,zh,FIELD(cd, ${result})

SELECT mcxs.*,sd.name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs='主线' and zh >= #{zhq} and zh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '左幅' and wz='主线') sd ON mcxs.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY mcxs.zh,FIELD(mcxs.cd, ${result})

SELECT mcxs.*,sd.name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs='主线' and zh >= #{zhq} and zh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '右幅' and wz='主线') sd ON mcxs.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY mcxs.zh,FIELD(mcxs.cd, ${result})

SELECT mcxs.*,ql.qlname name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs='主线' and zh >= #{zhq} and zh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_ql where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '左幅' and wz='主线') ql ON mcxs.proname=ql.proname ORDER BY mcxs.zh,FIELD(mcxs.cd, ${result})

SELECT mcxs.*,ql.qlname name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs='主线' and zh >= #{zhq} and zh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_ql where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '右幅' and wz='主线') ql ON mcxs.proname=ql.proname ORDER BY mcxs.zh,FIELD(mcxs.cd, ${result})

SELECT ldhd.*,fhlm.name from ( SELECT * from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs='主线' and zh >= #{zhq} and zh <= #{zhz}) ldhd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_fhlm where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '左幅' ) fhlm ON ldhd.proname=fhlm.proname ORDER BY ldhd.zh

SELECT ldhd.*,fhlm.name from ( SELECT * from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs='主线' and zh >= #{zhq} and zh <= #{zhz}) ldhd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_fhlm where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '右幅' ) fhlm ON ldhd.proname=fhlm.proname ORDER BY ldhd.zh

SELECT mcxs.*,sd.name from ( SELECT * from jjg_zdh_ldhd where proname = #{proname} and cd LIKE '${lf}%' and lxbs=#{zx} AND zdbs=#{bz} and zh >= #{sdzhq} and zh <= #{sdzhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zdbz=#{bz} and zhq = #{sdzhq} and zhz = #{sdzhz} and lf = #{lf} and wz=#{zx}) sd ON mcxs.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY mcxs.qdzh
